The 4th Blue Dragon Series Awards () ceremony, organised by Sports Chosun were held on July 18, 2025, at Paradise City, Incheon, at 20:30 KST. It will be hosted by Jun Hyun-moo and Im Yoon-ah and broadcast live through KBS2, CHZZK, TVING and Prizm.
The nominees were announced on June 27, 2025. The series which were produced and invested in by over-the-top (OTT) media platforms, and released from June 1, 2024, to May 31, 2025, were eligible for nominations.
